WorkItem.ClosedComment: I can't reproduce this with your project in our current bits, or in my own projects. Is this happening in other projects as well? That setting should be checked by default.
WorkItem.Description:
I have a TypeScript project and I've gone into the Tools > Options > TextEditor > TypeScript menu, and enabled "Auto list members".  When I do this, it works for the first file I code in. When I switch to another file, the auto listing stops working. If I open the tools window again, I see that the option is unchecked. If I check it, it works again...until I switch to another file, then it stops and is unchecked again in the dialog, etc.

Attached is a solution that I'm seeing this behavior in.

Comments.Message: Hmm. Perhaps it is a conflict with a plugin such as ReSharper, Web Workbench or Web Essentials?
